subject: p16508811
History: With dyspnea, eval fro acute process.
Findings: Right IJ access dialysis catheter again noted with its tip in the region of the right atrium. Increased retrocardiac opacity raises concern for pneumonia. Impression: Retrocardiac opacity concerning for pneumonia. Hilar congestion.
